entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WasmAppHost does not serve correct CORS headers for dotnet.native.worker.mjs #108460
  • [API Proposal]: Allow collections expression for other collections #108457
    10.0.0
  • Unactionable trim warnings on property/event with attribute that has RUC ctor #108454
    10.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement GetPEFileBase #108450
    10.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection fails to find the new version of the LDAP library on Alpine linux 3.20 #108448
  • Memory is not released when using TransactionScope with async option #108447
  • SerializationBinder.BindToName not called for an Array Type #108444
  • [API Proposal]: GeneratedCodeAttribute should have additional constructors #108443
  • Debugging from Visual Studio using Host.CreateDefaultBuilder sets the ContentRootPath to GetCurrentDirectory() which is not the output directory by default #108435
  • XmlSerializer does not respect member type specified in XmlElement attribute when DynamicCodeSupport is false #108432
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Branchless clamp #108431
    Future
  • Custom attributes are lost when configuring TraceListeners via an XML configuration file #108428
  • [Perf] Multiple platforms: Regressions in System.Reflection #108445
    10.0.0
  • Bug in IndexOf with InvariantCultureIgnoreCase in .NET 5 and above? #108424
  • Investigate use of new Apple JIT APIs #108423
    10.0.0
  • TCP Socket - Connection reset while receiving data #108421
    Future

Closed

  • Update our runtime-deps packages to provide guidance for users on Ubuntu 24.04 #105046
  • Ubuntu 24.04 LTS is not supported by the .NET 9 Preview installer. Please use the dotnet-install script - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-install-script. #106452
  • Reverting OS snapshot results in improper cleaning of dot net #107242
  • Unable to Install dotnetcore2 on macOS ARM64 (M1, M2, M3) Using Poetry #108316
  • Unmanaged memory growth with DiagnosticsClient #105132
    10.0.0
  • `NetworkCredential` method parameters nullability do not match `ICredentials` and `ICredentialsByHost` #108134
  • System.Uri throws an exception for absolute URI without two slashes after protocol (http:hostname) #107922
  • Add tests for structs with InlineArray attribute #107857
    10.0.0
  • NullReferenceException in SessionIDManager.RemoveSessionID #108426
  • Endless HttpMessageHandler cleanup cycle with C# cmdlets using .NET generic host #36172
    Future
  • Host error_codes.h should include basic description as comments #95615
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add trim annotations to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #108464
    area-System.Configuration
  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #108463
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #108462
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix buffer dropped reason in ConfigurableArrayPool #108461
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • use collection syntax in illink #108458
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: move funclet separation later #108456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add instructions to debug CLI builds using VS #108455
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Couple minor docs updates #108453
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Updated tsaoptions.json to direct issues to runtime owners #108451
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Prototype architecture independent code paths in the BCL #108449
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Investigate `SpawnBrowserAsync` issue by adding debugging. #108440
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [infra][android Disable Android ARM64 runtime tests job #108439
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108434
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Enable build with Checked option for libraries configuration #108433
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Update System.Formats.Nrbf ref sources and restore package description #108430
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [ppc64le] Fixed assertion failure which was occurring while running System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters tests #108429
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono][interp] Fix stack state after unconditional branch #108425
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use VNVisitReachingVNs in more places #108420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108419
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't bail out on side-effects in assertionprop #108418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Updated tsaoptions.json to direct issues to runtime owners #108452
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Fix devirtualization across genericness in the hierarchy #108442
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Couple minor docs updates #108407
    area-Meta
  • remove dead code from BCL.cs #108165
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fold some casts early in importer #108356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix partial compilation for CETCOMPAT mode #108062
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108283
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Dispose Xunit ToolCommand - follow up #108387
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Bump `Playwright` on `WasmBuildTests` to `1.47.0` #108441
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove `AppDomain` from `DebugInterface::Load/UnloadClass` #107808
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Swift interop] Add inline array struct lowering tests #107859
    area-Interop-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Disable `RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations` failing with a timeout #108427
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • Add comments to host error_codes.h #107775
    area-Host

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2550577 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    blocking, blocking-clean-ci, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108415
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow devirt into abstract classes if we saw a non-abstract child #108379
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Networking stress tests infrastructure improvements. #108325
    area-System.Net
  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Share pthread_setname via minipal #108370
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove OverflowException for ReadCborNegativeIntegerRepresentation #108398
    area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • Add build-time check for unwind proc_info_in_range #108250
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Add sampling profiler #108083
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0][PERF] Backport python pipeline changes for performance tests #108412
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • guard agains empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Pass content length into limited streams as Int64 #105481
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • feat: makes GeneratedCodeAttribute constructor parameters optional #108393
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement NibbleMap lookup and tests #108403
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix SIMD class retrieval and type checks #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [wasm] Debug missing MicrosoftNetCoreAppRuntimePackDir #107280
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException when buffers total size greater than 2GB #108380
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [WIP][NO-MERGE][infra] Try osx.1200.amd64.iphone.open queue #107923
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-arm64, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Expand an optimization for short values to IgnoreCase in single-value SearchValues<string> #108368
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, community-contribution, area-Threading-mono
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix flag assignment in pal_termios #108409
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet watch run` watches the .git folder. #43817
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43815
  • `dotnet build` results in "Unable to load the service index for source" and "Socket is not connected" #43814
  • [API Compat] Not targeting .NET 8 framework in versions 8.* #43801

PullRequests

Created

  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile in few places #43826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.404 #43824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.307 #43823
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.111 #43822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.428 #43821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.136 #43820
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #43819

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix typos #43730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DOCS] missing C++ requirements #43818
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix WriteSize() in BaseSerializer.cs #43810
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • WebSdk: new 'OneDeploy' publish method #43690
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Updated

  • Update manpages for 9.0 #43776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Add Lock comments for Windows setup #43699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow for older Windows SDK projection packages without profiles to build on .NET 9 #43795
    untriaged, Area-WindowsSDK
  • Disable baseline manifest generation #43797
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix baseline manifest version for RTM branding #43737
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers prerequisites #43794
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Add code to containers check to allow users to silence it #42501
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Issues

Closed

Updated

    Backlog
  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086

PullRequests

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add keyboard shortcut for "Add null checks" in Generate Constructor refactor #75320
  • Consider deriving `DiagnosticsPass` from `BoundTreeWalkerWithStackGuardWithoutRecursionOnTheLeftOfBinaryOperator`. #75319
    17.13
  • Pattern match condition in ternary resulting in collection expression fails to parse; ternary appears to be mis-parsed as nullability modifier #75318
  • "Field is never assigned" warning inconsistent for ref fields #75315
    17.13

Closed

  • Broken NGEN in 4.13 #75323
  • `System.InsufficientExecutionStackException` thrown in `LocalBinderFactory` compiling `ErrorFacts.IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic()` on MacOS #73439
    17.12
  • EnC: support moving fields and properties #69247
  • [Bug]: Building a .NET Core Function SDK 8.0.201 on a MAC with M1 chip #72393
    17.13
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35401.07 #75313
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35330.119 #75310
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35330.159 #75309

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix ambiguity parsing collection in conditional expressions #75328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make types in Workspace layer sealed #75321
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Only provide fallback options for host analyzers #75317
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Allow accessing ref fields through rvalues #75316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow OmniSharp to provide ImplementType Options #75312
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2550415 #75327
    auto-merge
  • Improve error reporting when reading bad metadata during EnC #75304
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Revert the Revert "Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs (#75172)" (#75279) #75324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • PR feedback on "use collection expression". #75303
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • EnC: Allow reordering members #75257
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve doc comments for `IConditionalOperation.IsRef` #75288
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Change rename command handler's behavior #75229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix crash with Dispose method with params #75305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Fixes comparison of VB XML literals #75301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix null coalescing operator emit with span conversion #75103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report error for native PDB limit #75293
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update insertion model after VS snap #75295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • EnC: allow changing accessibility of members #75191
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi incomplete/inconsistent enum handling #58195
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi specifies non-nullable get-only properties as nullable #58192
  • Add the ability to load a component using a File path. #58188
  • Asset fingerprinting does not work for `_content` and `_framework` files #58187
  • OpenApi: The IEndpointParameterMetadataProvider is not used for Controllers #58178

Closed

  • JavaScript InterOp Error : Can't find JavaScript function #58071
  • Use collection expression for ASP.NET Core Web API project template's WeatherForecastController.cs #58175
  • PasswordValidator should not throw when password is null #58133
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes #58177
  • Retry ConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate #58169
  • SignalR JS client incorrectly appends Authorization header #58146
  • Dockerized ASP.NET Core Blazor .NET 9 RC 1 static assets issue #57898

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #58198
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #58197
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add examples for attributes #58196
    area-mvc
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Enable signing on Non-Windows builds #58191
    area-infrastructure
  • Update efcore without runtime to help net10 flow #58190
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58186
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `6dae7eb` #58185
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0953a17` to `6dae7eb` #58184
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58183
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `6dae7eb` #58180
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58179
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Avoid unnecessary HealthStatus comparison #58176
    area-networking
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #58173
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Fixed to not throw an exception when password is null. #58168
    area-identity, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Use collection expression for ASP.NET Core Web API project template's WeatherForecastController.cs #58194
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57967
    Servicing-approved, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 9.0.0
  • Quarantine ResponseTests.ConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate #58189
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Update Selenium package version #58163
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Add note about perf to Http3SampleApp #58171
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Run static code analysis on IIS #58167
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #58035
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Stop using Mac 11 in Helix #58063
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Implement the Mvc PushFileStreamResult API #58161
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57966
    Servicing-approved, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell FlyoutItems disappear when left ALT key is pressed (Windows). #25046
  • MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton if initially hidden and shown even if ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25038
  • NavigateCommand Not Working #25037
  • ImageButton wrong size and missing border on Android #25034
  • The test NavigatingAndNavigatedFiresForShellModal fails #25027
  • iOS Release pipelines taking an hour #25022
  • [BUG] Duplicated items in searched results #25020

Closed

  • Memory Leaking and buggy Editor #23838
  • HybridWebView not showing on iOS 18 #25031
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [UITesting] Move ButtonHandler.ImageSourceInitializesCorrectly to appium #24916
    Backlog
  • CollectionView scroll in .NET MAUI Overlaps UI when there are more data. #15983
    Backlog
  • MediaPicker CapturePhotoAsync need parameter for rear or front camera #25032
  • Entry Text Alignment is different when Editing #25026
  • MAUI iOS Publish to AppStore: Rejected because of BrowserEngineKit in use #24980
  • [iOS, macOS] Text in the Editor control disappeared when reducing the Scale of the Editor control #24583
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Dropping a pic to copy works on Android but not on Win #6886
    Backlog
  • IconFont not working #8426
    Backlog
  • Error missing assembly when add bundle ID #25021
  • Platform specific Razor pages compiled for all platforms #25019
  • Remove excessive API docs in comments #24731
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add services.AddHybridWebViewDeveloperTools() extension to enable browser dev tools #25047
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Fix collectionview tests rc2 #25045
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Change HybridWebView default address to 0.0.0.1 #25044
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] [android] update `.aotprofile` for .NET 9 RC 2 #25043
  • Change HybridWebView default address to 0.0.0.1 #25042
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers (attempt 2) #25041
  • Remove Drag and Drop Tests from Catalyst #25039
  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    community ✨
  • [android] update `.aotprofile` for .NET 9 RC 2 #25035
  • [net9.0] Merge release rc2 to net9.0 #25028
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix deprecated API usage for embedded fonts on iOS/Catalyst 18.0+ #25025
  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #25024
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests

Merged

  • Update the Benchmarks.Droid app to use built in Android GetExternalFilesDir #25015
    community ✨, fixed-in-net8.0-nightly

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • List<string> property causes inclusion of additional columns that are not used in the projection. #34805
  • ChangeTracker.HasChanges() returns false even when entries are marked for deletion #34804

Closed

  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild dependency #34757
  • Unable to Download Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore Libraries in Visual Studio 2022 #34784
  • EF Core fails to execute simple LINQ to SQL #34792
  • Getting exception "The multi-part identifier could not be bound." when using GroupBy ,Contains and OrderBy #34801
  • Runtime Dynamic Global Query Filters (centralized where clauses for entities) #34720
  • Exclude individual enum values #34789
  • Modelbuilder.Model.GetEntityTypes() does not return mapped type T if there is not DbSet<T> defined in the context class #34791

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #34807
  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #34806
  • Keep parameter values out IMemoryCache in RelationalCommandCache #34803

Merged

  • (Attempt #2) Update azure-pipelines.yml for binskim #34802

Updated

  • Fix: Value cannot be null parameter name key #34730
    waiting-for-response
